detail_desc: Short, fitted skirt in sturdy jersey made from a viscose blend with decorative buttons down the front. Unlined.
Shorts in stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and front and back pockets.
Opaque leggings with soft thermal fleece inside and elastication at the waist and hems.

Joggers in woven fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, and flap back and leg pockets with a concealed press-stud. Slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
Long T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with a drawstring hood, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a raw-edge, rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Braided shopper in sturdy plastic with two handles at the top. Size 14x33x36 cm.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric. High collar with a diagonal zip and a kangaroo pocket. Fabric stripe down the sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.

Single-breasted jacket in soft, brushed fabric with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, jetted front pockets with a flap and three inner pockets, one with a button. One button at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Kangol x H&M. Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton and recycled polyester blend. High, elasticated waist, side pockets, and elastication at the hems.

V-neck, microfibre body with a light shaping effect on the waist and bum. Inset lace sections, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, press-studs at the crotch and laser-cut edges at the top and legs for a smooth silhouette. Lined gusset .
Baby Exclusive. Dress in soft, pointelle-knit organic cotton with a frilled collar, buttons at the back, long sleeves and a gently flared skirt.
Ankle-length jumpsuit in a viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, buttons at the front, a tie belt at the waist and wide, straight legs.
T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey with a narrow ribbed trim around the neckline.

NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Dress in a patterned viscose weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, an elasticated seam and decorative bow at the waist, and side pockets. Unlined.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elastication around the top.
Wide jersey top in a soft, stripe-print cotton and modal blend with short dolman sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Short-sleeved jumper in a soft pattern knit containing some mohair with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Wide, fabric-covered Alice band with a knot detail on the top.
Watch in stainless steel with an adjustable leather strap and metal buckle. Width of strap approx. 2 cm, total length 23 cm. Diameter of watch 3.6 cm.
Top in lightweight organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, wide, pleated sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a frill trim at the front, low waist, narrow ties at the sides and high cut at the back.
3/4-length leggings in washed, stretch denim with an elasticated waist and fake front pockets.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric. V-neck with a mesh detail front and back, removable inserts, double narrow shoulder straps and a racer back. Elastic hem. Medium support.
Ankle-length trousers in a viscose weave. Covered elastication at the waist with a small frill trim and a decorative bow with tassels. Side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Brazilian briefs in ribbed microfibre with a mid waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Trousers in woven fabric with a sheen. High waist with a concealed zip in one side and straight, wide legs with creases.
T-shirt in jersey with a motif.

Knee-length shirt jacket in soft faux shearling with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets, pockets in the side seams and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Pyjamas with a top and short shorts in soft, ribbed cotton jersey. Top with a round neckline and long sleeves with overlocked edges at the cuffs. Shorts with an elasticated waist and overlocked edges at the hems.
Printed jersey top with short cap sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short, sleeveless dress in sturdy jersey with a low-cut back, seam at the waist and flared skirt. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Dungarees in washed, stretch twill with adjustable straps and a pocket at the top. Side and back pockets, buttons at the sides and tapered legs.
Suede laptop case in the shape of an envelope. Concealed magnetic fastener and one inner compartment. Cotton lining. Fits 13" laptops.
Hat in a supersoft, brushed knit with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem.

Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and moulded, padded cups that lift and shape while providing good support. Elasticated hem and a fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes. Medium support.
Ballet pumps with a loop at the back. Satin linings and insoles and fluted soles with a small heel.

Top in soft viscose jersey with a unique nursing feature. The top has short sleeves and flares gently to the hem. The design includes a double layer at the top to help you keep warm while allowing easy access to the bust for nursing.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and a jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with an elasticated, drawstring waist, discreet side pockets and elasticated hems.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and a soft brushed inside. One patterned pair.
Tube scarf in soft double-layered jersey. Width 35 cm, circumference 30 cm.

Short shorts in a soft weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Partially concealed fabric belt with a metal square ring buckle at the front, side pockets, welt back pockets and short slits in the sides.
Leather sandals with covered block heels and narrow straps that tie around the ankles. Leather insoles. Heel 5.5 cm.
Long dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck front and back and short butterfly sleeves. Elasticated seam with a drawstring at the waist. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, wrapover funnel collar and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Double-layered hats in a soft, fine knit.
V-neck T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Long top in soft, ribbed jersey with long sleeves, high slits in the sides and a rounded, raw-edge hem. Longer at the back.
Suede sandals with a wide, adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels approx. 6 cm.
3/4-length pull-on trousers in an airy, patterned cotton weave with elasticated ribbing and a decorative bow at the waist. Fake fly, side pockets, a back pocket and elasticated hems.

Blouse in soft lace made from a cotton blend with a stand-up collar and gathers at the top to create soft draping front and back. Opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck, long puff sleeves, cuffs with covered buttons, and a gently rounded hem.
Large round stud earrings in embossed metal. Diameter 3 cm.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton and silk blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Sleeveless lace dress with an opening with a button at the back of the neck, seam with narrow elastication and a decorative bow at the waist and a lace-trimmed hem. Jersey-lined bodice and sewn-in inner skirt.
H&M SUPPORTS WWF. Long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and straight legs. Wide waist panel for best fit over the tummy.
Hat in braided paper straw with a grosgrain band. Mesh lining. Width of brim approx. 4 cm.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood and long raglan sleeves with grosgrain trims down the sides. Kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Hat knitted in a soft cotton blend with faux fur pompoms on the top, a turned-up hem and earflaps with ties at the bottom. Fleece lining.
Fitted, calf-length dress in ribbed jersey with long, gathered sleeves and a short slit at the front.
Short sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband.

Calf-length dress in a cotton weave with a double-layered top with a tie detail and support panels in the bodice. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a silicone trim at the top. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with broderie anglaise at the hem. Lined.
Joggers in cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, patch front pockets and ribbed hems.
Satin playsuit with a lace-trimmed V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and an elasticated seam at the waist.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh shoulder straps and a narrow racer back with elastic straps.
Jersey T-shirt in a soft modal and cotton blend.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in soft jersey with draping at one side and a slit at the hem in both sides.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit with ribbed cuffs.
Fitted vest top in stretch cotton jersey.
Knee-length cardigan in a soft, loose knit with long raglan sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No fasteners.
Faux fur headband with elastication at the back.
Blouse in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar with buttons at the back of the neck, a cut-out section at the back and short trumpet sleeves.

Hat and mittens in a cable-knit cotton blend containing some wool. Hat with a faux fur pompom on top, ribbed hem and earflaps with ties. Mittens with a ribbed foldover edge at the wrist. Fleece lining.
Knee-length dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and short sleeves with a drawstring. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Striped shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar and French front, Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Relaxed fit – a straight, relaxed shape with good room for movement to create a loose, comfortable silhouette.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in supersoft sweatshirt fabric with a brushed finish. Deep V-neck and a sewn-in wrapover at the front.
